title: Google offers me the lowest trade in value for my Pixel 3 compared to any other company !?
content: I am very disappointed with Google. I am trying to upgrade from my Pixel 3. Google actually is the one offering the lowest trade in value for my phone. In my opinion this is very disrespectful for their costumer as well as their own phones. I bought the Pixel 3 about two years ago for 800$ and now I am offered 60$ by Google. You just lost a costumer...
